name: UncontrollaBULL
description:
UncontrollaBULL is a video game that I made in 2 days for the GMTK game jam where the theme was OUT OF CONTROL

Description: In UncontrollaBULL you play as a rouge bull wreaking havoc on all in your way.

Controls: WASD to move and e to interact (more in depth tutorial in game)

Credits:
